headline: Boston Scientific Announces Participation in the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference and Conference Call Discussing Fourth Quarter 2024 Results
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) will participate in the 43rd Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 13, 2025, in San Francisco. Mike Mahoney, chairman and chief executive officer, will present at approximately 5:15 p.m. PT / 8:15 p.m. ET. Mahoney will be joined by Dan Brennan, executive vice president and chief financial officer, and Kenneth Stein, M.D., senior vice president and chief medical officer, in a question-and-answer session with the host analyst.
